response.overview: Molly is an adventurous and determined young girl. She believes in the existence of a mythological creature that supposedly lives in the woods near her home. Determined to find the proof, she recruits her best friend Devon, and together they set out to capture the evidence no one else has been able to.
response.tagline: They've heard the stories. They know the legend. Now they need to find the proof.
response.title: Big and Tall
